title: Per capita consumption of tree nuts in the U.S. 2000 to 2018
summary: In general Per capita consumption in pounds has rose over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2004 and 2005.
Maximum Per capita consumption in pounds, about 5.1 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 2.69 was reported at Year 2005
min_summary: In general Per capita consumption in pounds has rose over the Year.
